file_content.text: I'm waiting for all agents to report.
Keep your head down! I hear one of the prisoners released a rancor from the lower cell block.
This is quite the riot you've started.
If the Imperials have a spare guard to chase us, I'll swallow my helmet.
Don't waste time talking. Get out before it gets any more dangerous.
Good luck.
Thank you for your concern. Now, if you'll excuse me....
If the Hutts turned that place into a hunting ground, they'd make millions.
It was fun.
If the Hutts ever turned against the Empire like that, it would be far more than a cheap thrill.
Let's talk hazard pay.
I've authorized the funds to be released as soon as our agents report in.
Thank you for your service. Now if you'll excuse me....
Call sign Two-Moon, mission abort, return to Base One. Call sign Star-Killer, mission abort, return to Base One....
Once the prisoners are free, come back quick so I can give the other agents the all clear.
You can't have come at a worse time.
We should be safe for the moment. I think. But it's only a matter of time before Karhel gives us all up.
Everyone affiliated with the Republic needs to be out of here before they close the trap.
I assume, by that introduction, you work for the Republic?
Who are you?
Agent Jaysa Wise, call sign "Nutcracker." I've been stationed in Shadow Town for a year, along with half a dozen agents.
This is the Empire's prison. Home to their medical monstrosities and most dangerous captives.
What trap?
Are you talking about the Hutts, or is there someone worse to worry about?
"They," who?
The ground you're standing on is Imperial. This is where they stockpile their most dangerous prisoners and experiments.
I'm Agent Jaysa Wise, call sign "Nutcracker." The Republic has stationed a few of us here.
But one of our men was just captured, and with the tortures they use, it can't be long before he breaks.
I wouldn't let a servant of the Republic suffer at the Empire's hands.
Can I be of help?
I'm afraid Karhel is lost; it's those of us who still have our freedom that need help.
Is there any option besides retreat?
Can I help?
In this case, retreating isn't as easy as it sounds.
Daring escapes have always been one of my specialties.
I might be able to help.
A useful talent to have.
Surely, a Republic agent wouldn't betray his people so easily?
You don't trust your man?
I've studied the Imperials' methods for over a year. I doubt even the strongest Jedi could withstand their tortures.
Why are you telling me this?
I was hoping you could help.
The Empire's already searching for us. Only way to escape is to cause a distraction, but it's got to be massive.
They have mad Sith locked up here, captured aliens who were mutated by the dark side. Were they to escape....
Leave the Imperials to the mercies of their own prisoners. I like it.
So we'll start a riot.
Thank you. I didn't know how we would manage this.
Is that a proposal?
The Republic will pay for every agent who escapes alive.
Just go to the highest-security cells you can find and let out whatever's in there. With luck, there won't be a guard left to search for us.
Tell me when it's done, and I'll signal our men to escape.
A riot like that could kill hundreds. You need to find another way.
Too risky. [Refuse quest.]
See if you're so sensitive when it's your life on the line!
No other world would turn a blind eye to such atrocities.
